name: Find the Secret Stars
blurb: A world-wide scavenger hunt played using the iPhone's GPS capability. Plus a dash of 8-bit gaming charm sprinkled on top.

rewards.reward: We will place your name as a "Secret Star Backer" in the game, and give you three bonus stars, yours to place anywhere in the world.

Everything above + an in-game Secret Star named after you (your name will be on it forever). We'll inscribe that star with a personal message of your choice. Everyone who ever captures it will see your name and message. Leave your mark on the game forever!

Everything above + a sticker pack of our custom old-school video game artwork. In the process of designing the game, we're making a ton of awesome throw-back art. We'll take the best 7 and send them to you as one-of-a-kind sticker pack.

Everything above + we'll give you 3 mystery power-ups and 3 mystery power-stars (see FAQ). Will you have the temporary ability to see all the stars in the entire world? Will your hidden stars be invisible? Will you magnetically pull stars toward you as you walk around the world? Will you get to teleport stars to another location? Who knows! But it will be awesome.

Everything above + a fold-out poster/mind-map made from screenshots and pictures of all of our coding, brainstorming, and design sessions detailing the creation of Secret Stars and signed by the team.

Everything above + become a beta-tester for Secret Stars and start playing weeks before everyone else. We're setting this reward at a $120 price point in honor of Super Mario 64. This reward is limited to 80, since it's a lot of privileged access and takes a lot of work on our part.

Everything above + we will send you a set of custom made steel bookends in the shape of the Secret Stars logo. These are going to be sweet! (for backers outside the US, please add an additional 50 bucks because these suckers are gonna be heavy)

Everything above + you will have access to the Big Bang power-up. When you play the Big Bang, every star on the continent of your choice will fly towards you ("big crunch") and randomly explode back out to random spots on that continent ("big bang"). If you were the dude that loved to use the lightning power-up in Mario Kart, you're gonna love this.

Everything above + we will fly to you and play Super Mario 64 (or your Nintendo 64 game of choice). We know where all the tricky stars are if you need help. We bring the N64 and the beer. You bring your game face. We're willing to cover up to $500 of flight expenses, but if you live across an ocean, you might have to kick in on the plane ticket.

Everything above + we will fly to you, and spend two days teaching you or a loved one how to program your own iPhone apps (basic Objective-C, how use Xcode, the fundamentals of app design and architecture, and MySQL for backend stuff). iOS programming is by far one of the most lucrative skills in the job market so it's not a bad skill set to learn.
